preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 50.00 g of Cadmium Sulfide using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 150.00 g of Lanthanum Oxide. 
 3. Measure 40.00 g of Selenium Powder. 
 4. Measure 20.00 g of Silicon Dioxide. 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all measured powders thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer to ensure homogeneity.
